title: Around The AFC In 48 Minutes!
itunes:title: Around The AFC In 48 Minutes!
description:
A room filled with heroes- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling, Marc Sessler & Colleen Wolfe- assemble in-studio to go around the AFC in 48 minutes! Marc kicks it off by pondering about the Ravens in the last year under Ozzie Newsome (6:00); Followed by question marks about the rest of the league, including the Bills (12:00), Bengals and Marc’s Browns (18:00). The rest of the AFC is reviewed after halftime, which features a check-in with an old friend (33:00), before Tom Brady pleads the fifth to Jim Gray (43:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
